column4: i'm with xubuntu 10.04 x64 and i have this error when I write sudo apt-get update in terminal W: GPG error: http://ppa.launchpad.net lucid Release: The following signatures couldn't be verified because the public key is not available: NO_PUBKEY 35DA01C261E46227
go to the site you got that PPA info from, and see if there are commands they want you to run to add a proper signing key
